Package TransLib

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
TransLib.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Remote, MessagingLayer
public class Controller
extends UnicastRemoteObject
implements MessagingLayer
Controller - This class is the implementation of the MessageLayer, which is to simulate an unreliable network, all the message from each raft peer will be processed by this network, and the network decides whether to delay or drop the messages. Controller is an RMI server executing on an input port and managing communication of all raft peers. The instance is composed in the Config.
See Also:
Serialized Form
